Title: Relates to promoting animal fighting; and repeals certain provisions of such law relating thereto
Summary: Relates to promoting animal fighting and appropriately punishing individuals associated with such activities.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law and the penal law, in relation to detecting, disrupting and dismantling violent enterprise animal cruelty and appropriately punishing individuals associated with such enterprise cruelty; and to repeal certain provisions of the agriculture and markets law relating thereto
